# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/idna/compat.py
@source-hash: d3fb0e114313e025
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:00:28Z

## Purpose
Compatibility layer for the IDNA (Internationalized Domain Names in Applications) library, providing IDNA 2003-style function names that map to IDNA 2008 implementations.

## Key Functions
- **ToASCII (L5-6)**: Converts Unicode domain label to ASCII bytes representation using the core `encode()` function
- **ToUnicode (L8-9)**: Converts ASCII bytes/bytearray domain label back to Unicode string using the core `decode()` function  
- **nameprep (L11-12)**: Explicitly raises NotImplementedError since IDNA 2008 specification does not use the nameprep protocol (unlike IDNA 2003)

## Dependencies
- Imports all symbols from `.core` and `.codec` modules (L1-2)
- Uses `typing.Any` and `typing.Union` for type annotations (L3)

## Architecture Notes
- Acts as a bridge between IDNA 2003 naming conventions and IDNA 2008 implementation
- Maintains API compatibility while preventing usage of deprecated nameprep functionality
- Simple wrapper pattern - delegates actual work to core encoding/decoding functions
